com.devisubox.dvws.Runnable

Class NamedThreadFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devisubox.dvws.Runnable.NamedThreadFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory

    public class NamedThreadFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory
    Basic thread factory, that simply names a thread, according to its class name by default, and numbers them.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String name
      The thread's name
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger number
      The thread counter.
